$npc:11000065$is worried about the $npc:23100055$ that has taken position on the $map:02000099$, where it can cut power to the city. Defeat the robot and restore power to the utility tower.

quest.name: 방심은 금물
quest.desc: $map:02000100$$pp:와,과$ $map:02000270$ 지역 간 갈등이 심각한 것 같다. $map:02000146$$pp2:로,으로$ 돌아가서 $npc:11000266$에게 $npc:11000065$의 당부를 전해주자.

quest.name: Tightening Security
quest.desc: It seems the divide between $map:02000100$ and $map:02000270$ is quite severe. Return to the $map:02000146$ and deliver $npc:11000065$'s request to $npc:11000266$.

quest.name: The Sacred Feather
quest.desc: $map:02000146$'s $npc:11000009$ has stated that assistance is required to unravel the curse and grief at the Vayar Mountains, and that I should help $npc:11000039$ prepare the offerings for the service. I should be able to acquire $item:30000281$ from either $npc:23000019$ or $npc:23000020$.

quest.name: Dungeon: The Sacred Rock
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20002001$ (Entrance: $map:02000148$) Party Size (4 players) Quest possible only on Normal Mode.
$npc:11000009$ of $map:02000146$ has asked me to defeat the $npc:23100100$ and anything protecting $map:02000313$. I'm also to retrieve the $item:30000282$ and bring it to $npc:11000302$. With reliable comrades, I should have no problem retrieving the $item:30000282$ in $map:02000313$.

quest.name: Noble Beginnings
quest.desc: Expressing great trust and faith in $npc:11000009$, the son of $npc:11000134$, the chief of the Murpagos tribe, $npc:11000302$, has requested a relay of gratitude for retrieving the required offerings.

quest.name: Origins of Evil
quest.desc: $npc:11000007$ of $map:02000146$ believes that the powerful dark energy of the Devilyns in $map:02000115$ comes from the giant horns on their heads. I've been tasked with defeating them and retrieving $item:30000283$.

quest.name: Dungeon: Souls Awoken from Darkness
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20006001$ (Entrance: $map:02000146$) Party Size (4 players) Quest possible only on Normal Mode.
$npc:11000007$ of $map:02000146$ has expressed that the source of the darkness within $item:30000283$ was created by $npc:23100007$ by waking up spirits sleeping in darkness. Let's get to $map:02000356$, defeat $npc:23100007$, destroy the spirit stone used to wake the sleeping spirits and report the situation to $npc:11000015$ of $map:02000076$.
quest.manual: (Boss) Defeat $npc:23100007$ at $map:02000356$|Destroy the Spirit Stone at $map:02000213$

quest.name: This Is Just the Beginning
quest.desc: The Devilyns are merely the tail end of the Shadow Forces, or so says $npc:11000015$. It is of vital importance to remove the head from the Shadow Force's body. In order to accomplish this, it is primal that all of Maple World's Defenders and heroes trust and rely on one another. Let's return to $map:02000146$ and deliver the message of $npc:11000015$ to $npc:11000007$.

quest.name: 책 벌레, 아폴로
quest.desc: $npc:11000033$$pp:는,은$ [$item:39000011$] 책이 없어졌다고 말하며 $npc:11000604$$pp:가,이가$ 가지고 갔을 거라고 짐작하며 책을 돌려받아 가지고 오라고 말한다. $map:02000023$의 $map:02000109$에서 $npc:11000604$$pp:를,을$ 찾아보자.

quest.name: Apollo the Bookworm
quest.desc:
$npc:11000033$ believes that $npc:11000604$ has taken his book, [$item:39000011$], and requested that you retrieve it.
Search for $npc:11000604$ at $map:02000023$'s $map:02000109$.

quest.name: 독이 든 발톱
quest.desc: $npc:11000604$$pp:는,은$ $item:39000011$에 나와있는 내용 중 $npc:22000038$에 대한 내용이 진짜인지 확인해 보고 싶다며, $map:02000089$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $item:30000189$$pp:를,을$ 구해 오라고 한다.

quest.name: Claws-on Research
quest.desc:
$npc:11000604$ is willing to return $item:39000011$'s in exchange for some help with some hands-on-research.
All you need to do is harvest a $item:30000189$ from a $npc:22000038$ in $map:02000089$.

quest.name: 엘리니아의 괴수
quest.desc: $npc:11000604$$pp:는,은$ 책을 마저 다 읽을 시간을 벌기 위해 일부러 $item:30000189$$pp:를,을$ 구해 오라고 한 것이었다며 약을 올렸다. $npc:11000604$$pp:가,이$ 얄밉기는 하지만 $item:39000011$$pp:를,을$ 기다리고 있을 $npc:11000033$$pp:를,을$ 생각하면 잘잘못을 따질 시간이 없다. $npc:11000604$에게서 $item:30000189$$pp:를,을$ 받아서 $map:02000023$$pp2:로,으로$ 돌아가자.

quest.name: Ellinia's Monster
quest.desc: It turns out that $npc:11000604$ only sent you off to find the $item:30000189$ to buy time to read his book. Well, there's no sense getting upset now. $npc:11000033$ waiting in $map:02000023$ for you to return his copy of $item:39000011$.

quest.name: 던전 : 마지막 기록
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20010001$ (입구 맵 : $map:02000067$) 파티권장 (4명) 노멀 모드에서만 퀘스트 수행이 가능합니다.
$npc:11000995$에게 실종된 빅토리아호의 선장은 아버지나 다름없는 분이라고 한다. 깊은 바다 한 가운데에서 흔적도 없이 사라져 버린 가족을 찾는 심정으로 $npc:11000995$$pp:는,은$ 빅토리아호 실종 사건의 진상을 밝히고 싶어하는 것 같다. 실종된 빅토리아호 선장과 똑같은 이름으로 스스로를 지칭하는 $npc:23100015$!! 과연 그 실체는 무엇일지, 그 녀석이 정말 $item:39000032$$pp:를,을$ 가지고 있는지 확인해 보자.

quest.name: Dungeon: Captain's Log
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20010001$ Entrance: $map:02000067$ Party Size: 4 players This quest is only available on normal difficulty.
$npcName:11000995$ wants to unravel the truth of what happened to the Victoria. His investigation has revealed that the leader of the undead pirates goes by the same name as the captain of the lost ship! He wants you to find out the truth about this so-called $npc:23100015$ as well as to retrieve $item:39000032$.

quest.name: Emergency Summons
quest.desc: $npc:11000012$ of $map:02000001$, without saying hello, informed me that $npc:11000119$ is looking for me and that I should hurry. What could be happening? Let's go see $npc:11000119$.

quest.name: Forest Protection
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$ ordered me to $map:02000023$ to help $npc:11000031$. So, let's meet $npc:11000031$ in $map:02000023$.
quest.manual: Help $npc:11000031$ and complete the story [Light of the Forest]

quest.name: Life-Bearing Earth
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$ ordered me to $map:02000076$ to help $npc:11000001$. So, let's meet $npc:11000001$ in $map:02000076$.
quest.manual: Help $npc:11000001$ and complete the story [Earth's Strength]

quest.name: An Ocean that Swallowed the Darkness
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$ ordered me to $map:02000062$ to help $npc:11000019$. So, let's meet $npc:11000019$ in $map:02000062$.
quest.manual: Help $npc:11000019$ and complete the story [Shadow of the Ocean]

quest.name: Lost Time
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$ ordered me to $map:02000142$ to help $npc:11000869$. So, let's meet $npc:11000869$ in $map:02000142$.
quest.manual: Help $npc:11000869$ and complete the story [Shadow of Time]

quest.name: Find the Forest Spirit!
quest.desc: $npc:11000031$ says to defeat $npc:23000035$, $npc:23000017$, and $npc:23000047$, for they are absorbing all the $item:30000314$ which purifies the darkness and protects the forest. I must reclaim $item:30000314$.
quest.manual: (Boss) Defeat the giant monster at $map:02000023$ forest and reclaim $item:30000314$

quest.name: Dungeon: Forest of Lost Light
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20005001$ (Entrance: $map:02000090$) Party Size (4 players) Quest possible only on Normal Mode.
After handing me $item:30000315$, which is made of condensed $item:30000314$, $npc:11000031$ said to go to $map:02000315$, located in $map:02000090$, and to sprinkle it on a tree that has lost its vitality to restore the light of the forest.
quest.manual: Receive $item:30000315$ from $npc:11000031$|Unveil the light of the forest at $map:02000315$

quest.name: Strength of a Green Earth
quest.desc: $npc:11000001$ says to defeat $npc:22000322$, $npc:22000001$, and $npc:22000024$, for they are absorbing all the $item:30000316$ which purifies and protects the green meadows. I must reclaim $item:30000316$.
quest.manual: (Elite) Defeat monsters in the $map:02000076$ region and reclaim $item:30000316$

quest.name: Dungeon: Life, Purification, and Peace
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20003001$ (Entrance: $map:02000009$) Party Size (4 players) Quest possible only on Normal Mode.
After handing me a $item:30000317$ covered in $item:30000316$, $npc:11000001$ told me to go to $map:02000316$ and cover the baby Griffins with $item:30000317$ so that they may be born in their sacred form.
quest.manual: Receive $item:30000317$ from $npc:11000001$|Hatch fresh young griffins at $map:02000316$

quest.name: Ghostly Pirate Colony
quest.desc: $npc:11000019$ has requested help in retrieving $item:30000318$ and defeating the pirates occupying both $map:02000063$ and $map:02000067$. By meeting $npc:11000981$ at the marina in $map:02000062$ and riding the Marcos to $map:02000183$, I should be able to move quickly.
quest.manual: Defeat the pirates at $map:02000063$ and $map:02000067$ and find $item:30000318$

quest.name: Dungeon: Death's Path
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20010001$ (Entrance: $map:02000067$) Party Size (4 players) Quest possible only on Normal Mode.
$npc:11000995$ deciphered the coded message written by the captain of the Victoria and stolen from the pirates. The captain's message stated that he left something in the treasure chest at the pirates' fortress...! Let's go to $map:02000318$ and see if the message is right about the treasure chest!
quest.manual: Open the Footballfish treasure chest in $map:02000318$|Find clues left by the captain of the Victoria

quest.name: Chasing Victoria
quest.desc: $npc:11000995$, having checked the last coordinates of the Victoria, believes that there is something unidentifiable near the strait and has requested the dispatch of a coastal exploration team. $npc:11000982$ is preparing a boat at $map:02000183$, so I must quickly return to the $map:02000068$ of $map:02000062$ and tell $npc:11000019$ the news!

quest.name: Dungeon: Get to the Gear
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20011001$ (Entrance: $map:02000142$) Party Size (4 players) Quest possible only on Normal Mode.
Worried about the safety of $npc:11000871$, who entered $map:02000357$ of their own accord, $npc:11000869$ has requested the gear at $map:02000357$ be repaired, and that $npc:11000871$ be recovered. Let's go into the $map:02000357$ through the entrance at the top of the clock tower!

quest.name: 몽실몽실 분홍양
quest.desc: $npc:11000246$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11001013$에게 자신이 이사를 가기 전에 $item:30000328$$pp:를,을$ 데리고 집으로 놀러 오라고 전해 달라는 부탁을 했다. $map:02000002$에서 $npc:11001013$$pp:를,을$ 찾아보자.

quest.name: Baa Baa Pink Sheep
quest.desc: $npc:11000246$ wants you to ask $npc:11001013$ to visit with her $item:30000328$. He's moving soon and wants to hang out one last time. Those sheep must be pretty darn adorable! Look for $npc:11001013$ in $map:02000002$.

quest.name: 알퐁달퐁 목장으로
quest.desc: $npc:11001013$$pp:는,은$ 여행을 떠나기 전 $item:30000328$$pp:를,을$ $map:52000002$에 맡겨두고 갔었다며, $item:30000328$$pp:를,을$ 데리고 와 달라고 부탁했다. $map:02000002$에 있는 $map:52000002$$pp:를,을$ 찾아가서 $item:30000328$$pp:를,을$ 데리고 오자.

quest.name: To Baaalmy Farm
quest.desc: $npc:11001013$ left her $item:30000328$ at $map:52000002$ before her trip and has asked you to get it while she tracks down that comic book. How hard can it be to wrangle one cute, little sheep? You should go to $map:52000002$ in $map:02000002$ and bring back the $item:30000328$.

quest.name: 구하라, 핑크램!
quest.desc: $npc:11000833$$pp:는,은$ 늑대들이 $map:52000002$$pp:를,을$ 습격하는 바람에 울타리도 부서지고 $item:30000328$도 물고 가 버렸다며 울먹였다. $map:52000002$$pp2:로,으로$ 들어가서 $item:30000328$$pp:를,을$ 잡아간 늑대를 찾아 혼내주고, $item:30000328$도 무사히 구해오자.

quest.name: Save the Pastures!
quest.desc: $npc:11000833$ is in tears, because wolves broke through the fence into $map:52000002$ and ran off with $npc:11001013[gender:1]$'s $item:30000328$. You've got to go to $map:52000002$ fast and chase off those wolves before something bad happens to it.

quest.name: Dungeon: An Explorer's Curiosity
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20001001$ (Entrance: $map:02000183$) Party Size (4 players) Quest possible only on Normal Mode.
$npc:11000782$ at $map:02000183$ said that if he were a few years younger, he would have gone to $map:02000321$ and defeated $npc:23100006$ multiple times already, but is pressuring me to fight $npc:23100006$ instead. Although the pressure is not getting to me, it may still be a challenge worth taking on.

quest.name: Legendary Tale
quest.desc: $npc:11000782$ from $map:02000183$ is attempting to boast to $npc:11001064$, an adventurer on dispatch from the Adventurer's Guild, about an experience at $map:02000353$.

quest.name: Dungeon: An Adventurer's Curiosity
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20001001$ (Entrance: $map:02000183$) Party Size (4 players) Quest possible only on Normal Mode.
Unwilling to accept an adventurer with no proof of courage, $npc:11001064$ at $map:02000183$ has said to return after gaining a perfect understanding of $npc:23100006$.

quest.name: A Daughter's Letter
quest.desc: $npcTitle:11000074$ from $map:2000190$'s daughter, $npcName:11000058$, is requesting the delivery of a letter to her father at $map:2000065$ of $map:2000001$. Let's get to $map:2000065$ of $map:2000001$ and meet $npcTitle:11000074$.

quest.name: Location of Ermen
quest.desc: $npc:11000074$ says $npcName:11000058$ left a farewell letter before running off to find a way to save $npcName:11000057$, and that $npcName:11000058$ must be found before she falls to danger. I'll have to find $npc:11000012$ in $map:2000001$ and see if there is any unique mail that has been delivered to $map:2000190$ recently.

quest.name: The Place She Left
quest.desc: $npc:11000012$ said that a few days ago, a thick research packet was delivered from $map:2000309$ of $map:2000270$ to $map:2000190$. Let's go to $map:2000309$ of $map:2000270$ and investigate.

quest.name: Traces of Invasion
quest.desc: $map:2000309$ of $map:2000270$ was left a mess in the wake of an unidentified assailant. Luckily, $npc:11000843$ in $map:2000309$ handed over $item:30000380$, which may have the assailant's image caught on it. First I need to find out if the video data can be recovered. I'll need to take $item:30000380$ to $map:2000324$ and meet with $npc:11001097$.

quest.name: A Factory in Stasis
quest.desc: $npc:11001097$ of $map:2000324$ says that in order to recover the video, the generator that the monsters attacked must be reconnected. If I find the generator installed at the edge of $map:2000277$, I should be able to turn it on.
quest.manual: Defeat the robot monster at $map:2000277$|Operate $map:2000277$'s generator

quest.name: Unidentified Truth
quest.desc: $npc:11001097$ of $map:2000324$ found indiscernible scenes within the recovered video and asked that I return to $map:2000309$ and check with $npc:11000843$.

quest.name: Tremor of Time
quest.desc: At $map:2000276$, $npc:11000843$ has found a strange signal coming from the time energy that flows along the Time Barrier. Could it be connected to the incident at $map:2000309$? First, let's get to $map:2000276$ and assess the situation.

quest.name: Dynamic Energy Research
quest.desc: $npc:11001098$ of $map:2000276$ requested an analysis of all the data on the dynamic detection device. Let's go and collect all the $item:30000382$ in $map:2000276$.

quest.name: Questions in the Code
quest.desc: $npc:11001098$ of $map:2000276$, confused, said that there was something strange in the results of the analysis from the data collection of $item:30000382$. Let's return to $map:2000309$ of $map:2000270$ and give $item:30000383$ to $npc:11000843$.

quest.name: Into the Time Barrier
quest.desc: When $npc:11000843$ of $map:2000309$ placed $item:30000383$ in the time matrix of the research lab, the time matrix turned on and the entrance to $map:52000011$ opened. Let's go to $map:52000011$!

quest.name: The Trembling Time Barrier
quest.desc: $npc:11001099$ at $map:52000011$ stated that an unidentified strength shook $map:52000011$ and made it unstable. A request was made to help stabilize $map:52000011$. With $npc:11001099$, we should be able to defeat the monsters threatening $map:52000011$.
quest.manual: Defeat the monsters within $map:52000011$, which is connected through $map:2000309$, and stabilize the barrier

quest.name: Back to Reality
quest.desc: $npc:11001099$ at $map:52000011$, wishing to show gratitude, told me to go ask $npc:11000843$ to aid in the cause of discovering the shaking in $map:52000011$. I should return to $map:2000270$ $map:2000309$ and meet $npc:11000843$.

quest.name: Combination of Clues
quest.desc: Upon hearing of the situation in $map:52000011$, $npc:11000843$ of $map:2000309$ stated that he would personally go to $map:2000298$ and chase the unidentified assailants following the chaos time key log in an attempt to control time. He asks I return to $map:2000001$ and report on the situation at $map:52000011$ and $map:2000309$.

quest.name: Guardian of Time
quest.desc: After understanding the seriousness of the situation, $npc:11000074$ ordered $npcTitle:11000075$ to explain in further detail.

quest.name: The Red Lapenta's Truth
quest.desc: After receiving reports on the situation, $npc:11000075$ revealed that not only is the guardian protecting the Lapenta, but the Lapenta has also shown the willpower to protect the guardian. He tells me that what probably drew me to $map:52000011$ was the Red Lapenta's willpower. Accepting the idea around the Red Lapenta, $npc:11000075$ requested that I remain a reliable comrade to $npc:11000015$ until the power threatening $map:52000011$ is completely uprooted.

quest.name: In the Details
quest.desc: $npc:11000075$ requested that I care for $npc:11000058$, who has returned from $map:2000298$, and watch for any sign of injuries. Let's get to $map:2000190$ of $map:2000119$ and meet $npc:11000058$.

quest.name: Red Lapenta Guardian
quest.desc: $npc:11000058$ saw $npc:11001113$ at $map:2000304$ and asked the Red Lapenta guardian to find a way to put $npc:11000057$ back in the original place. While a difficult request, $npc:11000058$'s eyes are filled with desperation. I should get to $map:2000076$ and meet $npc:11000015$.

quest.name: Coexist as One
quest.desc: $npc:11000015$ of $map:2000076$ revealed that when the time floor at $map:2000304$ froze, the past and present became one at that moment... I've been ordered to go into $map:2000016$ and meet $npc:11000845$. Could $npc:11000845$ know a way to protect $npc:11001113$'s soul vial? FirstI must get to $map:2000016$!

quest.name: Labyrinth
quest.desc: $npc:11000845$, met in $map:2000016$'s past, said the only way to save $npc:11001113$ is to find where $npc:11001113$ was before the order of time is completely restored and the past closes. The only clue to go by is the giant orb of evil energy that was situated behind $npc:11001113$! I must hurry to $map:2000076$ and meet $npc:11000015$.

quest.name: The Returned
quest.desc: $npc:11000015$ of $map:2000076$ believes that $npc:11001113$ is somewhere in the Land of Darkness, and recommends traveling to $map:3009017$ to talk to the people who were rescued from Katramus. $map:3009017$ can be found at $map:3000143$, in the Land of Darkness.

quest.name: Asking Survivors
quest.desc: $npc:11000069$ was unexpectedly encountered at $map:3009017$. He had come with $npc:11000064$ to take care of the Katramus rescuers. As for the giant orb of evil energy, he said to ask the rescuers, as they've lived in the Land of Darkness for a long time.

quest.name: Legendary Terror
quest.desc: $npc:11001106$ of $map:3009017$ called the giant demonic orb the "Soul Orb" and said that it was located in $map:52000012$. Let's find out if anyone knows where $map:52000012$ is.

quest.name: Children's Stories
quest.desc: $npc:11001107$ of $map:3009017$ overheard the Katramus supervisors say that $map:52000012$ is located in $map:3000007$.

quest.name: Past a Fierce Wind
quest.desc: $npc:11000069$ heard that $npc:11000064$ is at $map:3009018$ in $map:3000007$, but says to find $npc:11000064$ first.

quest.name: Faith Maintained
quest.desc: Having heard all the circumstances, $npc:11000064$ agreed to come along to $map:52000012$ to help save $npc:11000057$.

quest.name: Once More, Together Now!
quest.desc: $npc:11000064$ said we should hurry and find the entrance to $map:52000012$ that $npc:11000807$ told us about before the order of time completely restores. Let's find $map:52000012$ near the road going from $map:3000007$ to $map:3000021$.

quest.name: QUESTDESCRIPTION_10002611_NAME
quest.desc: $npc:11000064$ said to go into $map:52000013$ and look for $npc:11001113$'s soul. ...I recall a heartbreaking memory of returning to $map:2000220$ and falling to my knees before the hardened $npc:11001112$. Will I be able to save $npc:11001112$ this time? I will enter $map:52000013$, the place standing in the middle of $map:52000012$.

quest.name: Like a Dream
quest.desc: Did I lose consciousness at $map:52000013$? That flashing glare... I woke up at $map:3009017$. As I was wandering around $map:52000013$, the order of time must have been restored, and in the process of $map:52000012$ returning to the present I must have been tossed from $map:52000013$. The memory of $npc:11001112$, though like a dream, feels all too real... I'll head to $map:2000190$ and share the news of $npc:11000057$ with $npc:11000058$.

quest.name: Feeling Bella
quest.desc: Having heard news of $npc:11000057$, $npc:11000058$ says she felt the exact memories and emotions as when they were growing up together. It must be a special bond between the twin sisters... Let's go to $map:2000001$ $map:2000065$ and share $npc:11000057$'s news with $npc:11000074$.

quest.name: Striving for Desire
quest.desc: After hearing news of $npc:11000057$, $npc:11000074$ became speechless as the sadness, guilt, and remorse toward his daughter sank in. In that instant I witnessed the soft-hearted father hidden behind the dignity and grace of the kingdom's royal minister. If time could be reversed...would $npcName:11000074$ make the same decision? If he had saved $npc:11000057$ instead of $npc:11000075$, how different would the world be...? It seems like $npcName:11000074$ is lost in guilt and sadness, and needs some time to himself. I should head to $map:2000025$ and share $npc:11000057$'s news with $npcTitle:11000075$.

quest.name: Courageous & Friendly
quest.desc: $npc:11000136$ of $map:02000051$ spoke about $map:02000325$, where $npc:21800006$, through ancient spirit sorcery, has been directly fighting and judging the skills of challengers through the spirits monsters. Let's go to $map:02000217$ and meet $npc:11000289$ to find out more about $map:02000325$.

quest.name: Dungeon: A New Challenge
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:25000001$ (Entrance: $map:2000217$)
$npc:11000289$ took the challenge at $map:02000325$, but couldn't even pass the first test. He assured me that until he passes all the tests he won't give up, and will continue to train for as long as it takes. He also proposed a bet in regards to whoever can pass the first test at $map:02000325$ and meet $npc:21800006$. If there isn't a good reason to avoid it, then it's not such a bad idea to take up the challenge at $map:02000325$.

quest.name: Dungeon: Brave Spirit
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:25000001$ (Entrance: $map:2000217$)
$npc:11000675$ of $map:02000217$ advised me not to be lazy with training at $map:02000325$. I need to show everybody my spirit is brave and earn their recognition.

quest.name: Warm Encouragement
quest.desc: $npc:11001177$, standing watch at the vigilante guard post at $map:2000057$, couldn't hide their excitement when speaking of $npc:11000015$. $npc:11000015$'s role is to personally check the guard posts near the $map:2000076$ region with the supply corps as a way of encouraging them. Since the guards can't afford to be negligent in their duties, $npcName:11001177$ has requested that I deliver $item:30000412$ to the supply soldier who has gone to $map:2000091$.

quest.name: Dungeon: Enemy Beyond the Palace
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:25003001$ (Entrance: $map:2000091$)
$npc:11000959$ of $map:2000091$ requested my help in protecting the watchtower beyond the palace walls, as wild pigs are after the emergency rations located inside. $npc:11000015$ and the supply corps are doing their best in this emergency situation and need my help. Let's go to $map:02000334$ to defeat the pigs and protect the watchtower!
quest.manual: Defeat the leader of the pig herd at $map:02000334$

quest.name: Dungeon: Revenge Gone Wrong
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:02000334$ (Entrance: $map:2000091$)
$npc:11001178$ is hiding in the lower region of $map:2000091$! He angrily confirmed that $npc:24001205$, the leader of the pigs attacking $map:02000334$, originally escaped from his pig farm and totally ruined the place when it returned to attack on more than one occasion. $npc:11001178$ warned that $npc:24001205$ won't give up until all the rations inside the watchtower are taken. He said that even as he speaks, $npc:24001205$ is probably gathering more pigs in order to cause more chaos. Could $npc:11001178$'s words be true? Would the pigs I assumed were utterly defeated attack the palace walls again? Let's return to $map:02000334$ and check out the situation!
quest.manual: Defeat $npc:24001205$, the leader of the pig herd, at $map:02000334$

quest.name: Strange Ones
quest.desc: In the middle of $map:2000064$ there are some fairly odd people. $map:2000064$ $npc:11000172$ suspects that these unidentified people are the strangers who entered through $map:2000062$ a few days ago. Who are they? Where are they from? Why have they come here? Let's meet the strange people face to face!

quest.name: Well-deserved Me Time
quest.desc: $npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! She says you look exhausted, and suggests you take a spa day and get refreshed! You are feeling pretty tired. Maybe you should take her suggestion? If you are not so lucky as to have a tub or massage chair to utilize in your own home, why not wander into someone else's?
quest.manual: Take a bubble bath in a $item:50400036$ |Wash your feet in a $item:50400091$ |Receive a massage in a $item:50400037$

quest.name: The Idiot Box
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Having heard that watching TV makes you stupid, she asks you for help finding the truth of this myth.
Does TV really make you stupid? You should go find out! What's the worst that could happen?

quest.name: Befriending a Feline
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Spurned by the stray cats of $map:02000064$, she asks you to see if a $item:50400004$ will enhance her chances at feline companionship.
Well, anything for friendship! it looks like it's time to start knocking on doors until you find a house with a $item:50400004$, and a cat to play with.
quest.manual: Play with a cat in a $item:50400004$

quest.name: Raise the Roof
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! She heard there's a house around here decorated like a dance club. She has tasked you with finding one such party-worthy house so she can get her groove on.
Look around for a house with the requested lighting conditions!

quest.name: Master of the Arcade
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! In the hopes of making new friends, she seeks the approval of local video game enthusiasts. $npcName:11001180$ asks you to try out various arcade games and find one that's not too difficult to play, so that she does not embarrass herself.
Time to go on a video game hunt!

quest.name: You've Got it Maid
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! She is considering work as a maid in the hopes of learning more directly about the culture of Victoria Island.
$npcName:11001180$ has tasked you with performing various house chores, and reporting back as to how difficult a task it was. Nobody likes chores, but perhaps you can take one for the team.
Whether in your own house, or helping out at a friends, go take care of some chores!

quest.name: Healthy Habit #2
quest.desc: $npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Noticing the queasy look on your face, she advised you to seek out a toilet for immediate release. Come to think of it, when was the last time you relieved yourself? Perhaps you should take care of business now, before something regretable happens.
quest.manual: Use $item:50400054$ to take care of business

quest.name: The Odiferous Adventurer
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular note, is your profound odor! Perhaps you should take a break from adventuring and spend some time washing up?
At this point, any sink and shower should do.
quest.manual: Use $item:50400053$ to wash your face |Use $item:50400035$ to take a shower

quest.name: Think Cool
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Having heard of a wonderful device known as a "refrigerator," she has asked you to go and see if it works as well at keeping things cold as she has been told.
Find a home with the recommended brand of refrigerator, and pop your head inside!

quest.name: Feel the Burn
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Her latest infatuation is with the world of high-tech exercise equipment. Are these devices really better than exercising the old-fashioned way? Looks like it's up to you to find out!
Go find a $item:50400096$ and test it out!

quest.name: Shed those Pounds
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Her latest infatuation is with the world of high-tech exercise equipment. Are these devices really better than exercising the old-fashioned way? Looks like it's up to you to find out!
Go find a $item:50400098$ and test it out!

quest.name: Cool as a Cucumber
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Having heard of a wonderful device known as a "refrigerator," she has asked you to go and see if it works as well at keeping things cold as she has been told.
Find a home with the recommended brand of refrigerator, and pop your head inside!

quest.name: Ice Cold
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Having heard of a wonderful device known as a "refrigerator," she has asked you to go and see if it works as well at keeping things cold as she has been told.
Find a home with the recommended brand of refrigerator, and pop your head inside!

quest.name: Maximum Freshness
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Having heard of a wonderful device known as a "refrigerator," she has asked you to go and see if it works as well at keeping things cold as she has been told.
Find a home with the recommended brand of refrigerator, and pop your head inside!

quest.name: Stay Frosty
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Having heard of a wonderful device known as a "refrigerator," she has asked you to go and see if it works as well at keeping things cold as she has been told.
Find a home with the recommended brand of refrigerator, and pop your head inside!

quest.name: Solitary Bliss
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating, and what better way to process one's thoughts than while fishing. $npcName:11001180$ suggests you get over your troubles by sitting quietly in a comfortable $item:50400092$ and collecting your thoughts.
Someone around here must have one in their house you can borrow!

quest.name: Practicality vs. Taste
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular interest to her, are the many foods the land has to offer.
Concerned about her diet, $npcName:11001180$ asks you to try $itemPlural:20000014$ on her behalf and tell her how they taste. It's a good thing adventuring burns a lot of calories...
$itemPlural:20000014$ can be found in the vicinity of $map:2000118$.

quest.name: Chewy, Sweet, and Sour
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular interest to her, are the many foods the land has to offer.
Concerned about her diet, $npcName:11001180$ asks you to try $itemPlural:20000015$ on her behalf and tell her how they taste. It's a good thing adventuring burns a lot of calories...
$itemPlural:20000015$ can be found in the vicinity of $map:2000138$.

quest.name: Delicious, Nutritious Medicine
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular interest to her, are the many foods the land has to offer.
Concerned about her diet, $npcName:11001180$ asks you to eat $itemPlural:20000016$ on her behalf and tell her how they taste. It's a good thing adventuring burns a lot of calories...
$itemPlural:20000016$ can be made by digging up $item:20000045$ in the vicinity of $map:2000146$ and tossing it in a blender at $map:2000026$.

quest.name: Abuzz About Sweets
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular interest to her, are the many foods the land has to offer.
Concerned about her diet, $npcName:11001180$ asks you to try $itemPlural:20000043$ on her behalf and tell her how they taste. It's a good thing adventuring burns a lot of calories...
$itemPlural:20000043$ can be found in the vicinity of $map:2000117$.

quest.name: Slurp 'n' Crunch
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular interest to her, are the many foods the land has to offer.
Concerned about her diet, $npcName:11001180$ asks you to try $itemPlural:20000044$ on her behalf and tell her how they taste. It's a good thing adventuring burns a lot of calories...
$itemPlural:20000044$ can be found in the vicinity of $map:2000059$.

quest.name: A Funny Taste
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular interest to her, are the many foods the land has to offer.
Concerned about her diet, $npcName:11001180$ asks you to try $itemPlural:20000046$ on her behalf and tell her how they taste. It's a good thing adventuring burns a lot of calories...
$itemPlural:20000046$ can be found in the Barrota cargo container at $map:2000139$.

quest.name: Taste the Abyss
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular interest to her, are the many foods the land has to offer.
Concerned about her diet, $npcName:11001180$ asks you to try $itemPlural:20000047$ on her behalf and tell her how they taste. It's a good thing adventuring burns a lot of calories...
$itemPlural:20000047$ can be found in the vicinity of $map:2000146$.

quest.name: The Technical Definition of Food
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular interest to her, are the many foods the land has to offer.
Concerned about her diet, $npcName:11001180$ asks you to try $itemPlural:20000050$ on her behalf and tell her how they taste. It's a good thing adventuring burns a lot of calories...
$itemPlural:20000050$ can be found in the vicinity of $map:2000134$.

quest.name: Salad, Deconstructed
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular interest to her, are the many foods the land has to offer.
Concerned about her diet, $npcName:11001180$ asks you to try $itemPlural:20000052$ on her behalf and tell her how they taste. It's a good thing adventuring burns a lot of calories...
$itemPlural:20000052$ can be found in the vicinity of $map:2000024$.

quest.name: Squishy, Healthy, Prodigiously Gross
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular interest to her, are the many foods the land has to offer.
Concerned about her diet, $npcName:11001180$ asks you to try $itemPlural:20000053$ on her behalf and tell her how they taste. It's a good thing adventuring burns a lot of calories...
$itemPlural:20000053$ can be found in the vicinity of $map:2000052$.

quest.name: Say Aah!
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular interest to her, are the many foods the land has to offer.
Concerned about her diet, $npcName:11001180$ asks you to try $itemPlural:20000054$ on her behalf and tell her how they taste. Maybe you should sit this one out...
$itemPlural:20000054$ can be found at the Ant Tunnel.

quest.name: Too Chewy
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular interest to her, are the many foods the land has to offer.
Concerned about her diet, $npcName:11001180$ asks you to try $itemPlural:20000055$ on her behalf and tell her how they taste. It's a good thing adventuring burns a lot of calories...
$itemPlural:20000055$ can be found in the vicinity of $map:2000017$.

quest.name: Dewy Detox
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Of particular interest to her, are the many foods the land has to offer.
Concerned about her diet, $npcName:11001180$ asks you to try $itemPlural:20000060$ on her behalf and tell her how they taste. It's a good thing adventuring burns a lot of calories...
$itemPlural:20000060$ can be found in the vicinity of $map:2000043$.

quest.name: Stress Test
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Having witnessed people all over the globe smashing various objects to relieve stress, she suggests that such acts of destruction can offer the same benefits for you!
Go forth and break stuff, in the name of stress relief!

quest.name: Earn Your Wings
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Rumor has it, that if you free a fellow adventurer from under a tombstone, you can grow a pair of heavenly wings!
There's nothing wrong with doing a good deed in the name of wicked cool accessories!
quest.manual: Break other people's tombstones to save them from the clutches of death

quest.name: Greetings from Tria
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Secretly worried that you have no friends, she demands that you go and greet people in $map:2000001$.
Time to make some new friends, or die trying!

quest.name: Hello, Henesys!
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Secretly worried that you have no friends, she demands that you go and greet people in $map:2000076$.
Time to make some new friends, or die trying!

quest.name: Eyy, Ellinia!
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Secretly worried that you have no friends, she demands that you go and greet people in $map:2000023$.
Time to make some new friends, or die trying!

quest.name: Howdy, Perion!
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Secretly worried that you have no friends, she demands that you go and greet people in $map:2000051$.
Time to make some new friends, or die trying!

quest.name: Keep it Real, Kerning City!
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Secretly worried that you have no friends, she demands that you go and greet people in $map:2000100$.
Time to make some new friends, or die trying!

quest.name: Take Care, Taliskar!
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Secretly worried that you have no friends, she demands that you go and greet people in $map:2000270$.
Time to make some new friends, or die trying!

quest.name: A Lazy Day Inn
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! For example, it's home to $map:2000033$, a cozy little spot to put your feet up and relax.
$npc:11001180$ says you should swing by, sit down, and take a load off. Why not? You can't spend every moment of the day saving the world.
quest.manual: Sit and relax at $map:2000033$ for 300 seconds

quest.name: A Wonderful Vacation
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Sensing your growing weariness, she tells you to take a vacation at $map:2000171$ in $map:2000178$, one of the finest resorts Maple World has to offer.
It's been a while since you took a break from smacking monsters and saving villages, what could a little vacation hurt?
quest.manual: Sit and relax at $map:2000178$ for 300 seconds

quest.name: Adventures in Literacy: A Griffin's Adventure
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Having heard great things about the best-selling book "$item:39000001$," she asks you to procure her a copy.
It sounds like such a sweet story. You should begin your book-search at $map:2000031$!

quest.name: Reduce, Reuse, Dismantle
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! She suggests you dismantle any unneeded equipment to receive various useful materials.
No sense letting that hideous outfit from 10 levels ago clog up your inventory! Obliterate it into scraps, and pretend it never existed!

quest.name: An Eventful Day
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Having heard about the exciting events put on by the famous $npc:11000168$ has pressured you into participating.
She hasn't specified which... $map:61000002$, $map:61000001$, $map:61000006$, any of his events should do. Pick one, and go for first place!

quest.name: Furry-tailed Friends
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating, but above all she treasures friendship. As one of her friends, it would mean the world to $npcName:11001180$ if you got along with her oldest friend in Victoria Island, $npcName:11000711$.
$npcName:11000711$ can be found near the taxi stop in $map:02000064$. Stop by and say hello!

quest.name: Dancing in the Dirt
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Having heard rumors of mysteriously quaking patches of earth in $map:02000118$ she has asked you to investigate.
Well, you'd better drop everything to go stare at the dirt near $npc:11001310$ in $map:02000118$ for signs of movement.
quest.manual: Locate and investigate the shaking earth in $map:02000118$

quest.name: Adventures in Literacy: Home Decor Trends
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Eager to read something titled "$item:39000015$," but with no idea where to find it, she has once again tasked you with something any reasonably person would take care of themselves: book-shopping.
You should start your search at $map:2000031$!

quest.name: Adventures in Literacy: All About That Bed
quest.desc: $npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! She wants to read $item:39000016$, and has tasked you with tracking down a copy. You should begin your search at $map:2000031$!

quest.name: Adventures in Literacy: Home, Sweet Home
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Eager to read something titled "$item:39000017$," but with no idea where to find it, she has once again tasked you with something any reasonably person would take care of themselves: book-shopping.
You should start your search at $map:2000031$!

quest.name: Adventures in Literacy: Urban Home Trends
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Eager to read something titled "$item:39000018$," but with no idea where to find it, she has once again tasked you with something any reasonably person would take care of themselves: book-shopping.
You should start your search at $map:2000031$!

quest.name: Adventures in Literacy: The Perion Aesthetic
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Eager to read something titled "$item:39000019$," but with no idea where to find it, she has once again tasked you with something any reasonably person would take care of themselves: book-shopping.
You should start your search at $map:2000031$!

quest.name: Adventures in Literacy: Pretty as a Peach
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Eager to read something titled "$item:39000030$," but with no idea where to find it, she has once again tasked you with something any reasonably person would take care of themselves: book-shopping.
You should start your search at $map:2000031$!

quest.name: Adventures in Literacy: Luscious Locks
quest.desc: $npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! She wants to read $item:39000014$, and has tasked you with tracking down a copy. You should begin your search at $map:2000031$!

quest.name: Adventures in Literacy: Block by Block
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! She wants to read a magazine called "$item:39000020$", but doesn't know where to find it.
For something this specialized, you should try searching $npc:11000252$'s bed at the $map:2000158$!

quest.name: Adventures in Literacy: Wild Rides
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! After becoming curious about automobiles, she has asked you to track down a copy of "$item:39000007$" on her behalf.
You should try talking with $npc:11000325$ at $map:2000001$.

quest.name: Adventures in Literacy: Behind Bars
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001180$ finds everything about Maple World fascinating! Eager to learn more about prison, she asks you to bring her a copy of "$item:39000009$."
You should talk to the guards at $map:2000124$!

quest.name: Before Darkness Blooms
quest.desc: $npcName:11000037$ of $map:2000023$ has spoken of the Havi monsters lurking around the shadow doors at Victoria Island. The $item:30000435$, carrying a powerful dark energy, provide the Havi monsters the ability to linger past death as $item:30000435$ survives to bare fruit. Let's defeat the powerful Havi monsters lurking around the shadow doors. They may be carrying $item:30000435$. I must collect it.
quest.manual: Defeat monsters of level 26 and above near the shadow door and collect $item:30000435$

quest.name: Darkness Returned
quest.desc: $map:2000350$ is a branch of the giant darkness that has been discovered in $map:2000048$, and $npc:11000031$ of $map:2000023$ has requested assistance in uprooting it. Let's meet $npc:11001228$ in $map:2000048$.

quest.name: Dungeon: A Meaningful First Challenge
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:25008001$ (Entrance: $map:2000048$)
$npc:11001228$, who I came across at the entrance of $map:2000350$ of $map:2000048$, has explained that $map:2000350$ is a branch grown from the Seed of Darkness, and that it functions as a conduit for which darkness spreads. Though not an easy task, everyone must work together to fight this giant darkness, otherwise the world will belong to the Demon King. In order to fill the world's darkness with light, we must be brave and push onward.
quest.manual: Remove the first darkness at $map:2000350$ and pass

quest.name: [Dungeon] Attacking the Darkness
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:25008001$ (Entrance: $map:2000048$)
$npcName:11001241$ is unable to fulfill her duty of purifying the $map:2000350$ due to Havi poisoning. She doesn't think you have what it takes to do her job, and challenges you to survivng ten waves in the $map:2000350$.

quest.name: Flying Blind
quest.desc: $npcName:11000407$, who lives in $map:2000306$ of $map:2000133$, heard that some vagabond in the Land of Darkness saw $npcName:11000064$ in $map:3000103$, and has requested confirmation. I can get to the Land of Darkness's $map:3000103$ through the shadow door in $map:2000146$.
quest.complete: Go to $map:3000103$ the in Land of Darkness and find $npcName:11000064$

quest.name: Dungeon: Birth of the Demon
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21013001$ (Entrance: $map:3000103$) Party Size (4 players) Quest possible only on Normal Mode.
$npc:11001238$, protector of the Land of Darkness's $map:3000103$, recalls seeing $npcName:11000064$ jump into $map:2000349$. Is $npcName:11000064$ safe? I should hurry inside $map:2000349$ and look for $npcName:11000064$...

quest.name: Reckless Life
quest.desc: After hearing what happened in $map:2000349$, $npcName:11000407$ of $map:2000306$ requested I go to $map:2000228$ at $map:2000146$, take $item:30000434$ to treat $npcName:11000064$'s injury, and then ask him why he went to $map:2000349$ alone.

quest.name: Forbidden Adventure
quest.desc:
The Boroboro Fairy $npcName:11001239$ is shaking in terror on one side of $map:2000103$! Out of curiosity, she and other $map:2000023$ Fairies defied the chief's orders and left the village on an adventure to the Land of Darkness. During their journey, they came face-to-face with the witch who protects $map:3000103$, but she was the only one who managed to escape. She wants her friends delivered from $map:3000103$... Let's get to $map:3000103$ in the Land of Darkness and search for the Fairies with $npcName:11001239$.
At $map:3000103$ exists the Land of Darkness, which is connected to the $map:2000146$ shadow door.

quest.name: Dungeon: Tricky Witch
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21013001$ (Entrance: $map:3000103$) Party Size (4 players) Quest possible only on Normal Mode.
$npcName:11001238$ in $map:3000103$ is smiling slyly, having lied to $npcName:11001239$ and the other Fairies about being able to find a shortcut home if they jumped into $map:2000349$. Let's go into $map:2000349$ and save the Fairies before their souls are devoured by darkness.
quest.manual: Save all the Fairies at $map:2000349$ in the Land of Darkness's $map:3000103$
quest.complete: Meet $npcName:11001238$ at the Land of Darkness's $map:3000103$

quest.name: Dungeon: Curious Witch
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21013001$ (Entrance: $map:3000103$) Party Size (4 players) Quest possible only on Normal Mode.
$npcName:11001238$ of $map:3000103$ says if I find out who the Demon King's new son born in $map:2000349$ is, she will give me a valuable treasure chest. Although I am curious about the witch's treasure chest, finding out about the Demon King's new son is a challenge worth doing whether anything comes from it or not.
quest.manual: Defeat the Demon King's son at $map:2000349$ in the Land of Darkness's $map:3000103$
quest.complete: Meet $npcName:11001238$ at the Land of Darkness's $map:3000103$

quest.name: Where Is He?
quest.desc: $npcName:11001274$ is waiting in the grassy field behind the taxi stop at $map:2000064$! Seems as though he is waiting on Bomar, a member of the Arikari Merchant Society... Where is Bomar, anyway? Shouldn't there be someone in the Arikari Merchant Society, located in $map:2000064$, who may know his whereabouts?

quest.name: Best Buds
quest.desc: $npcName:11001180$, who has been looking around $map:2000064$ excitedly, is now reminiscing and listening to stories of his homeland, Karkara Island. Unfortunately, there hasn't been any news of Bomar... Could $npcName:11001181$, Bomar's closest friend within the Arikari Merchant Society, know of his whereabouts? Let's go see!

quest.name: Secret Message
quest.desc: $npcName:11001181$ revealed that Bomar left a letter asking for the care of $npcName:11001274$ until he returned. The letter was delivered by $npcName:11000994$, who is in charge of all the minor chores in $map:2000062$. $npcName:11001181$ says I should ask $npcName:11000994$, for he may know of Bomar's whereabouts.

quest.name: Back to Home!
quest.desc: $npcName:11000994$ of $map:2000062$ said that Bomar went on a boat to $map:2000183$ with $npc:11001276$. $map:2000183$… Why would Bomar go all the way there with the inventors? Going to $map:2000183$ to find Bomar and his company seems like the thing to do...but walking there won't be easy. $npcName:11000994$ secretly gives boat rides to $map:2000183$. I should ask him for a favor...

quest.name: The Alliance Acts
quest.desc: The invasion of Tria cost many lives—including Joddy, who fought bravely when the time came. But this latest attack has only strengthened $npcName:11000075$'s resolve to band together and fight back against the darkness.

quest.name: The Forgotten Ones
quest.desc: Until now, the forces of darkness have had Tria and its allies on the defensive. Empress $npcName:11000075$ wonders if Madria's dragon might somehow be related to the lumarigon, an ancient race of dragons who vanished long ago. Captain Allon reports that a dragon-like monster has appeared in Karkar Island. This may be an opportunity to strike back.

quest.name: To a New Land
quest.desc:
The Maple Alliance has set up a temporary headquarters in $map:02010002$ of Karkar Island. However, the seas around the island have been rough lately, so $npc:11000076$ had to commission a special ship to make the trip.
Find $npc:11001276$ in $map:02000183$ to charter your trip.

quest.name: Earthbound
quest.desc: $npcName:11001276$ invented the Lumiwind, a ship that can fly through the air. Unfortunately, it broke down after its maiden voyage. Get the full story from $npcName:11001276$.

quest.name: The Retired Inventor
quest.desc: $npcName:11001011$ is the engineer who helped build the Lumiwind with $npc:11001276$. He's the only one who can repair the ship, but he recently retired to $map:02000182$.

quest.name: His Story
quest.desc: $npcName:11001011$ dedicated his youth to building the Lumiwind. But, right as the invention was nearing completion, he realized that he and his family had drifted away from each other. The Lumiwind was his passion, but it's not worth losing the ones he loved...

quest.name: The Lumiwind of My Youth
quest.desc: $npcName:11001011$ steadfastly refused to repair the Lumiwind... until you put his pride as an engineer on the line. However, while he's doing the repairs, you need to do his chores so his family is none the wiser. Today's chore: fighting pirates at $map:02000182$.

quest.name: Take to the Skies
quest.desc: $npcName:11001011$'s repairs are complete. Return to $map:02000183$, and ask $npcName:11001276$ to let you ride the Lumiwind.

quest.name: A Desert Land
quest.desc: $npcName:11001276$ let you ride the Lumiwind all the way to Karkar Island. Meet his assistant, $npcName:11001403$, and ask for directions to the $map:02010059$.

quest.name: A Base away from Home
quest.desc: Now that you've arrived at Karkar Island, it's time to go to the $map:02010059$ in $map:02010002$. Meet $npcName:11001310$ in $map:02010002$.

quest.name: An Unexpected Problem
quest.desc: According to $npcName:11001310$, strange things have been happening at Karkar Island. Get the details from $npcName:11001311$ in the $map:02010059$.

quest.name: Words Are Cheap
quest.desc: The guards are paralyzed by fear since hearing of the attack on $map:02000001$. They haven't made any progress, but for some reason $npcName:11000251$, the infamous mob boss, is in town. It's possible he knows something useful. Find him in the $map:02010020$.

quest.name: A Shady Encounter
quest.desc: After you put the Blackstar gangsters in their place, the $npcName:11003119$ arranged for you to meet $npcName:11000251$. Meet him in the $map:52010010$.

quest.name: The Criminal Express
quest.desc: In exchange for his information, $npcName:11000251$ wants your help taking back a train that was stolen from his group. Defeat the thieves who hijacked the Blaknov.

quest.name: Unfair Trade
quest.desc:
According to $npcName:11000251$, the dragon-like creature is searching for traces of the lumarigon, just like you. Although this race of dragons no longer exists, there are certain children who still carry their legacy. He'll tell you more... for a price.
Go to $map:02010019$ and see how you can help $npcName:11001342$ with their bug problem.

quest.name: Bug Attack
quest.desc: A swarm of bugs have invaded all of $map:02010019$, making business impossible. You know what to do.

quest.name: Pest Extermination
quest.desc: You have the insect menace on the ropes—it's time to finish the job! Go into $map:02010019$ and defeat the king of the bugs, the $npcName:23190066$!

quest.name: Done Deal
quest.desc: After thanking you for saving the park, his job, and his last chance for happiness, $npcName:11001342$ tells you to return to headquarters for your pay. Speak with $npcName:11000251$ at the $map:52010010$.

quest.name: The Four Children
quest.desc:
It is said that Biset, the last Dragon Master, died protecting four children. It is said that one of these children has the Lumenstone, an artifact of light, and that the mysterious dragon-man is looking for it.
Two of the children are in Blackstar's clutches. Since you've been so nice to $npcName:11000251$, he will let you see one of them. Go to $map:02010064$ in the $map:02010016$ and meet her.

quest.name: Circuit Queen
quest.desc: $npcName:11001297$ insists that you help her friend—$npcName:11001294$, another one of Biset's wards. Go to the $map:52010004$ in $map:02010020$ and rescue him from Blackstar.

quest.name: Champion's Favor
quest.desc:
After hearing that Blackstar is after the lumarigon, $npcName:11001294$ is worried about his friends. He wants you to make sure the other two are still safe.
Go to $map:02010053$ in $map:02010002$ and talk to $npcName:11001292$.

quest.name: The Prickly Chef
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001294$ is certain that $npcName:11000735$'s favorite rock must be the Lumenstone. He thinks your best bet is to ask one of the local meerkat patrols for help finding her.
Go to $map:02010063$ and look for a meerkat named $npcName:11001313$.

quest.name: The Awoken Dead
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001313$ wants you to investigate a pyramid where the undead have been rising. It belonged to a kingdom of lumarigon-worshipers, but they vanished after giving in to the darkness. Do this, and he'll help you find Mika.
Enter the Illusory Pyramid dungeon and report what you find.

quest.name: In Another Temple
quest.desc: $npcName:11001313$ saw a girl go into the $map:02010052$ at the $map:02010026$. Search for her in the $map:02010052$ dungeon.

quest.name: A Desert People
quest.desc: While he couldn't help you find the girl, $npcName:11001313$ has heard of a dragon-like monster. Go to $map:02010023$ and meet with $npcName:11001315$, granddaughter of the Moropapa Tribe's chief, and ask her about the monster that attacked their village.

quest.name: The Fallen Chief
quest.desc:
$npc:11001214$ has been wary of outsiders ever since the Land of Darkness was sealed years ago. His granddaughter, $npcName:11001315$, is hesitant to deal with you... but she needs $item:30000492$ to treat her ill grandfather.
Look in the herb jars, exterminate any bugs that pop out, and get $item:30000492$ for $npcName:11001315$.
quest.manual: Check jars and defeat bugs for $item:30000492$

quest.name: The Monster's Identity
quest.desc: Since you were such a big help, $npcName:11001315$ has agreed to let you meet with her grandfather, the chief. Meet $npc:11001214$ in $map:52010011$.

quest.name: Rescue Mika
quest.desc:
Deep within Nazkar Temple, there is a $map:52010006$. $npcName:11001214$ says that $npcName:11001363$ is there, and you are the only one who can rescue her.
Hurry to the $map:52010006$ in $map:02010030$!

quest.name: Visitor from Another World
quest.desc:
Following your example, the guards tracked down and chased the dragon-man into the $map:02010055$, the shrine of the lost Merjit civilization in the $map:02010029$. It is said that whatever caused Merjit to collapse began in this chamber...
Use the Enter Dungeon button to go to the $map:02010055$ and put a stop to this monster's plans.
quest.manual: Press Enter Dungeon to go to $dungeonTitle:20018002$ and defeat $npcName:23000068$

quest.name: Friends Reunited
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000735$ came by and asked the guards to thank you on her behalf. You should meet her in person before you return to $map:02000001$.
She should be back at $map:52010014$ by now.

quest.name: A Dead End
quest.desc: The soldiers are withdrawing from Karkar Island. It's time to return to $map:02000001$ with them. Report to $npc:11001969$ in the $map:52000087$.

quest.name: Mika and Moropapa
quest.desc: As soon as I met $npc:11001314$, he yelled to get out. Will I be able to change his mind?

quest.name: Dragon's Footprints
quest.desc: Upon hearing the whole story, $npc:11001314$ said to retrieve the record left by the ancient Lumieragon. He will then decipher it and find out how $npcName:11000735$ can find her destiny.

quest.name: A Dragon's Connection
quest.desc: After receiving $item:30000471$ and $item:30000470$, $npcName:11001314$ said that as soon as $npcName:11000735$ arrives, he will begin deciphering.
quest.manual: Wait for Lumieragon to decipher the record

quest.name: Oracle of Salvation
quest.desc: $npcName:11001314$, who has found information in the ancient Lumieragon records about a special link among the Lumieragons, knows of an intermediary who can help establish the connection between Leila and $npcName:11000735$. He says to go to $map:02010026$ and find $npcName:11001258$.

quest.name: Preparing for a Ritual
quest.desc: Despite feeling uneasy about the darkness surrounding her, $npcName:11001258$ has said she will help establish the connection between Leila and $npcName:11000735$. Let's bring back $npcName:11001258$'s items that $npcName:21000694$ and $npcName:21000684$ of $map:02010026$ took.
quest.manual: Defeat the $map:02010026$ monsters and find $item:30000472$|Defeat the $map:02010026$ monsters and find $item:30000473$|Defeat the $map:02010026$ monsters and find $item:30000474$

quest.name: Lumieragon's Memory
quest.desc: $npcName:11001258$ said that when the orb of prophecy begins to react once the ritual begins, it will open up a tunnel of communication. Let's help so that Leila and Mika may safely establish a connection.
quest.manual: Help to establish the connection between Leila and $npcName:11000735$

quest.name: To Find a Memory Fragment
quest.desc: $npcName:11001258$ spoke in detail of what $npcName:11000735$ saw, which she herself observed during the connection ritual. $npcName:11001258$ also said that the memory fragment Leila sent must be found before Kargon or other servants of darkness find it. Let's find the memory fragment at $map:02010047$ and return.

quest.name: Unsolved Destiny
quest.desc: $npcName:11000735$ is standing shocked in front of an unconscious $npcName:11001258$...mumbling that before $npcName:11001258$ fainted, she said to find $npcName:11001224$ in Nazkar Temple. $npcName:11000735$ says it's urgent we find $npcName:11001224$.

quest.name: The Truth about Kabo
quest.desc: $npcName:11001224$, a member of the Naskar Temple's clergy, gives off an odd vibe...! He says he told $npcName:11000735$ that the power to find her destiny and return everything back to normal is at $map:52010006$. I should head to $map:52010006$ and help $npcName:11000735$.

quest.name: Repeat Ordeal
quest.desc: Uneasy, $npcName:11001479$ shared news about $npcName:11000735$, saying that she'd been poisoned by the shadow poison at $map:52010006$, and that the Rame Stone has been lost. Would Empress $npcName:11000075$ know of any methods to treat $npcName:11000735$ and recover the lost Rame Stone? Let's go to $map:02010059$ and meet the empress.

quest.name: The Empress's Wisdom
quest.desc: Empress $npcName:11000075$ stated that she's discovered an entrance to $map:52010007$ in $map:02010034$. If the power of light is to be maintained by $npcName:11000735$, $npcName:11000735$ must be taken to $map:52010007$ immediately. Let's return to $map:02010053$ and relay the message to $npcName:11001216$.

quest.name: To Find the Power of the Light
quest.desc: $npcName:11001216$ said that he heard about $map:52010007$ before, and that he and his friends will take $npcName:11000735$ and meet me at $map:52010007$.

quest.name: The Secret of the Temple
quest.desc: Speaking on how the power of light was weakly connected in $map:52010007$, the empress spoke of the Irunba Sanctuary of Light in $map:02010055$, where the ancient Lumieragon elders gathered to discuss connection the light. Could the Rame Stone really be in $map:02010055$ as the empress said? If that is the case...with what intentions would someone have taken the Rame Stone to $map:02010055$? First, let's find the Nazkar Temple map to help locate $map:02010055$.
quest.manual: Defeat the monsters in the Nazkar Temple region and find the map of Nazkar

quest.name: To Find the Sanctuary of Light
quest.desc: Empress $npcName:11000075$, disappointed after seeing the $item:30000513$, hoped that one of the dragon knights, $npcName:11001216$, $npcName:11001218$, or $npcName:11001217$, would find and bring back the torn portion of the map.
quest.manual: Wait until the dragon knights return from $map:52010007$
quest.complete: Find the dragon knights who have gone to $map:02010029$

quest.name: Dungeon: What Moore Saw
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20018002$ (Entrance: $map:02010029$) Party Size (10 players)
Scout $npcName:11001483$ was hiding and shaking by the entrance to $map:02010055$, which was discovered in $map:02010029$! Although scared, due to scout habit she didn't take her eyes off the entrance to $map:02010055$. It's clear she saw the dragon knights $npcName:11001216$, $npcName:11001218$, and $npcName:11001217$, enter. Will the dragon knights be able to find the Rame Stone in $map:02010055$? Let's get to $map:02010055$ and meet them.
quest.manual: Go into $map:02010055$ and meet the dragon knights

quest.name: With Hope
quest.desc: Still hidden by the entrance to $map:02010055$, $npc:11001483$ explained that $npcName:11001216$ and his friends just came out of $map:02010055$ and ran off claiming they had to meet the empress. I remember before I left $map:52010007$, the empress said that as soon as the Rame Stone is taken from $map:02010055$, $map:52010007$ will disappear into the darkness. She said to return to $map:02010059$ once the Rame Stone is reclaimed.

quest.name: The Nightmare
quest.desc: They who followed the ancient Lumieragons and protected the royals: the Moropapa! $npc:11001314$'s granddaughter, $npcName:11001215$, shared that her grandfather has been suffering from a nightmare, where in the depths of Nazkar Temple a giant black dragon appears and the temple crumbles. For $npcName:11001215$, who is shaking with anxiety, let's get into Nazkar Temple and explore $map:02010029$ to see if anything has happened.

quest.name: Dungeon: Secrets of Lubelisk
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:2010055$ (Entrance: $map:02010029$) Party Size (10 players)
$npc:11001483$, hiding by the entrance to $map:02010055$, noted that $npcName:11001215$'s grandfather's nightmare may actually be true. $npc:11001483$ says that if I have the courage, I should into $map:02010055$ and find out what's going on.

quest.name: Through the Darkness
quest.desc: How long has it been since the dragon knights recovered the Rame Stone from $npcName:23000068$ for $npcName:11000735$, who's been inflicted with shadow poison...? From $npcName:11000076$ came the delightful news that $npcName:11000735$ left to find the sacred stone carrying an ancient Lumieragon martyr who can help her overcome the shadow poison and achieve her destiny as the Light's Descendant. However, this sacred stone of the ancient Lumieragon is being kept within $map:02010055$, the place $npcName:23000068$ and the Kargon troops took over… It will be too dangerous with only $npcName:11000735$ and the dragon knights... Let's follow $npcName:11000735$ and look for the $map:52010017$ entrance in $map:02010029$, which is an alternate route to $map:02010055$.

quest.name: Light Gathering
quest.desc: $npcName:11000735$, who I met in $map:52010017$, despite suffering from shadow poison, says she heard her mother's voice telling her that she needs to find the sacred stone of the ancient Lumieragon. Hearing Leila's voice could have been a miracle that rose from a mother's concern that her daughter may lose her life before fulfilling her destiny as the Light's Descendant... Let's help $npcName:11000735$ safely find the pieces of light in $map:52010017$!
quest.manual: Help $npcName:11000735$ find the pieces of light at $map:52010017$

quest.name: New Birth
quest.desc: It seems that $npcName:11000735$ and her friends were all sent to different locations when $npcName:11000735$ opened the path of light before the light's power was under control. With $npcName:11000075$, let's look for $npcName:11000735$'s party in $map:52010007$.
quest.manual: Wait for the birth of the Light's Descendant at $map:52010007$
quest.complete: Greet $npcName:11000735$, who was reborn as the Light's Descendant, at $map:52010007$

quest.name: Return with the Light
quest.desc: $npcName:11000735$, reborn as the Light's Descendant, went back to Drachenheim promising to return after defeating Drachenheim and freeing Lumieragon from the darkness with all of the Lumieragon's power intact.
quest.manual: At $map:52010007$, see $npcName:11000735$ off, who is returning to Drachenheim.

quest.name: [Dungeon] Puri's gift.
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001228$ is a who fairy who is collecting havi fruit outside the $map:02000350$! She provides gifts and services for warriors fighting the corruption of the $map:02000350$.
If you manage to make it deep enough inside, she'll give you a gift!

quest.desc: Let's go to $map:52010014$ at Karkar Island's $map:02010002$.

quest.name: New Knowledge
quest.desc: $npcName:11001229$'s teacher is looking for me. Let's go to $map:52000018$.

quest.name: Her Interpretation, Two
quest.desc: $npcName:11001280$, staying at $map:02000361$, is said to be looking for me.
